name: The president's speech
description:
PROTECT YOUR PRESIDENT! DESCRIPTION

The president made a speech, but someone did not like it. Block explosions of bullets and grenades with the help of brave bodyguards, defend the president and bring him to the car so that he can defeat the main terrorist.

HOW TO PLAY 🎮
  • Click an hold on bodyguard
  • Drag and drop them to block bullets and grenades!

    !

Bodyguards that have been lying for more than 1 second cannot block anything.

IF YOU LOST BODYGUARD OR PRESIDENT
*Don't worry we have plenty of them*
